headline: An Unstoppable Dividend Growth Machine For A Throwaway World: Waste Management

headline: How WM’s US$7.2 Billion Stericycle Deal Is Reshaping Its Healthcare and Renewable Energy Strategy
summary: In recent days, Waste Management has drawn strong interest from investors and received several analyst upgrades, reflecting confidence in the company’s fundamentals and its expanding presence in recycling, healthcare waste, and renewable energy. An important development is Waste Management’s US$7.2 billion acquisition of Stericycle, which significantly increases its role in the healthcare waste sector and potentially creates efficiencies across its broader platform. We’ll explore how Waste...

headline: Waste Management (WM): Exploring Valuation After Analyst Upgrades and the Stericycle Acquisition
summary: In a wave of analyst upgrades and new coverage this week, Waste Management (WM) is drawing market attention as major banks cite its strong fundamentals, strategic expansion, and the recent Stericycle acquisition. The company’s diversification appears to be a driving force behind its resilience. See our latest analysis for Waste Management. Despite a recent earnings miss and cautious revenue guidance, Waste Management's share price has shown relative stability, climbing 8.4% year-to-date and...
